text: If I imprint Time Walk on Panoptic Mirror, can I get infinite turns?
I am being attacked by Agonasaur Rex and I declare Aegis Turtle as a blocker. But before assigning damage, I play Bounce Off on Aegis Turtle. Do I receive the full 8 damage from Agonasaur Rex?
I am being attacked by Axebane Ferox and I declare Aegis Turtle as a blocker. But before assigning damage, I play Bounce Off on Aegis Turtle. Do I still receive 4 damage from Agonasaur Rex?
Someone is playing Flashfreeze on one of my spells, Can I play Aven Interrupter on top of Flashfreeze so my initial spell can be resolved?

I am being attacked by Axebane Ferox and I declare Balamb T-Rexaur as a blocker. After assigning damage, both creatures should die. As a response of my Balamb T-Rexaur dying, can I play Corrupted Conviction to sacrifice it to draw two cards?
